DOC.brief_title: Ritodrine Oral Maintenance Tocolysis After Active Preterm Labor
DOC.detailed_description: We randomize 120 woman singleton pregnancy successfully treat threatened preterm labor 34 complete week receive either maintenance tocolysis two 40 mg ritodrine sustain release capsule three time day ( study group , n=62 ) treatment ( control group , n=58 ) three day . The primary outcome measure recurrent episode threaten preterm labor within 72 hour , define regular palpable uterine contraction change cervical effacement and/or cervical dilatation clinical examination . Secondary outcome measure include incidence preterm birth , neonatal adverse outcome , maternal side effect .
